price: Kandi Shitani nakoshya gukora ikibi, ujye wiragiza Allah kuko mu by’ukuri ari Uwumva bihebuje, Umumenyi uhebuje.
arabic: وَإِمَّا يَنزَغَنَّكَ مِنَ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنِ نَزۡغٞ فَٱسۡتَعِذۡ بِٱللَّهِۚ إِنَّهُۥ سَمِيعٌ عَلِيمٌ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wa-immā yanzaghannaka mina al-shayṭāni nazghun fa-is'taʿidh bil-lahi innahu samīʿun ʿalīmun
translations: an evil suggestion comes to you
